name: Sipa (Dewey)
description:
Sipa is a hyper-casual mobile game based on the traditional game in the Philippines with the same name. The player must prevent the pato from falling out of bounds by timing the swipe. 

Developers:

Niel Angelo Dela Cruz 

 Darniel Zidane Garcia 

 Duane Matthew Rodriguez 

 Danielle Anne Merielle Puyat
